00010 namespace CALICE {
00013   EVENT::LCGenericObject *cloneLCGenericObject(EVENT::LCObject *obj) {
00014     EVENT::LCGenericObject *generic_object=dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject *>(obj);
00015     if (!generic_object) {
00016       throw std::runtime_error( "ERROR:For the time being only objects of type LCGenericObject can be cloned." );
00017     }
00018 
00019     IMPL::LCGenericObjectImpl *clone=new LCGenericObjectImplCloner(*generic_object);
00020     return clone;
00021   }
00022 
00023   EVENT::LCGenericObject *cloneLCGenericObject(EVENT::LCGenericObject *generic_object) {
00024     if (!generic_object) {
00025       throw std::runtime_error( "ERROR:For the time being only objects of type LCGenericObject can be cloned." );
00026     }
00027 
00028     IMPL::LCGenericObjectImpl *clone=new LCGenericObjectImplCloner(*generic_object);
00029     return clone;
00030   }
00031 
00032   EVENT::LCCollection *cloneCollection(EVENT::LCCollection *col)
00033   {
00034     // Clone collection
00035     // ---
00036     // Unfortunately, the collection has to be cloned because the original collection 
00037     // will be deleted  when the conditions data changes which is just before it would 
00038     // be written.
00039     
00040     IMPL::LCCollectionVec *a_col=new IMPL::LCCollectionVec(col->getTypeName());
00041     // clone the elements
00042 
00043     if (col->getNumberOfElements()>0) {
00044       bool type_names_are_identical=true;
00045       bool objects_are_fixed_size=true;
00046       EVENT::LCGenericObject *first_object=dynamic_cast<EVENT::LCGenericObject *>(col->getElementAt(0));
00047       if (!first_object) {
00048         throw std::runtime_error( "ERROR:For the time being only objects of type LCGenericObject can be cloned." );
00049       }
00050       
00051       for (UInt_t element_i=0; element_i<static_cast<UInt_t>(col->getNumberOfElements()); element_i++) {
00052         EVENT::LCGenericObject *new_object=dynamic_cast<EVENT::LCGenericObject *>(col->getElementAt(element_i));
00053         a_col->addElement(cloneLCGenericObject(new_object));
00054         if (!new_object->isFixedSize()) {
00055           objects_are_fixed_size=false;
00056         }
00057         if (first_object->getTypeName()!=new_object->getTypeName()) {
00058           type_names_are_identical=false;
00059         } 
00060       }
00061 
00062       if (!type_names_are_identical) {
00063         throw std::logic_error("ERROR:cloneCollection> No support for collection which contain objects of different types.");
00064       }
00065       if(  col->parameters().getStringVal( "TypeName" ).size() ==  0 )
00066         a_col->parameters().setValue( "TypeName", first_object->getTypeName() ) ;
00067       if (objects_are_fixed_size) {
00068         if(  col->parameters().getStringVal( "DataDescription" ).size() ==  0 )
00069           a_col->parameters().setValue( "DataDescription", first_object->getDataDescription() ) ;
00070       }
00071     }
00072     
00073     // clone the parameters elements
00074     // Unfortunately, this requires a lot of pointless copying.
00075     StringVec keys;
00076     // copy int parameters
00077     col->getParameters().getIntKeys(keys);
00078     for (StringVec::const_iterator key_iter=keys.begin();
00079          key_iter!= keys.end();
00080          key_iter++) {
00081       IntVec values;
00082       a_col->parameters().setValues(*key_iter,col->getParameters().getIntVals(*key_iter,values));
00083     }
00084 
00085     // copy float parameters
00086     keys.clear();
00087     col->getParameters().getFloatKeys(keys);
00088     for (StringVec::const_iterator key_iter=keys.begin();
00089          key_iter!= keys.end();
00090          key_iter++) {
00091       FloatVec values;
00092       a_col->parameters().setValues(*key_iter,col->getParameters().getFloatVals(*key_iter,values));
00093     }
00094 
00095     // copy string parameters
00096     keys.clear();
00097     col->getParameters().getStringKeys(keys);
00098     for (StringVec::const_iterator key_iter=keys.begin();
00099          key_iter!= keys.end();
00100          key_iter++) {
00101       StringVec values;
00102       a_col->parameters().setValues(*key_iter,col->getParameters().getStringVals(*key_iter,values));
00103       //      std::cout << *key_iter << ":"; 
00104       //      for(StringVec::const_iterator value_iter=values.begin(); value_iter!=values.end(); value_iter++) {
00105       //        std::cout << " " << *value_iter;
00106       //      }
00107       //      std::cout << std::endl;
00108     }
00109     return a_col;
00110   }
00111 
00112 }
